##################
## Propositions ##
##################

### Feature Selection ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. SelectKBest(chi2, k=2) : chi2 ou mutual_info_classif 
2. Recursive feature elimination (RFE)

### Modèles -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. Logistic regression ===> from cuml.linear_model.logistic_regression import LogisticRegression
2. SVM ===> from cuml.svm import SVC
3. kNN ===> from cuml.neighbors import NearestNeighbors
4. Decision Trees ===> XGBoost
5. Neural network ===> pytorch ? Faire simple avec sklearn mais du coup sans cudf ?
